START_MESSAGE: This bot was created by LneravzFeedBackBot. Please use /help command for help message.
HELP_MESSAGE: Please use /send command with reply message for send feedback and wait for answer from bot owner.
YOU_BANNED: You can't send feedback. You banned from bot!
FEEDBACK_SENT: Feedback message sent. Please wait for answer.
WRONG_USER_ID: Wrong user id. Please check it and try again.
INTERVAL_SET: Time interval set for new message.
HELP_OWNER_MESSAGE:
Owner commands:
- /start - Starts the bot
- /help - Shows help menu
- /answer (user id) - Sends replied message to user id
- /ban (user id) - Bans the user from sending messages
- /unban (user id) - Unbans the user from sending messages
- /time (minutes) - Sets the time interval for sending a new message to a user

Other users use /send command for sending feedback
